subject: Exemption for levy of user fee to Dignitaries

Extb:' 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 W 6, 02r-10, ETT, 74 farvi-t10 075 G-5 & 6, Sactor-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/50/02-03/CMD-CO/VIP (Non-MP) (36} 05 December , 2005 CIRCUAR NQ;NEAILCOMMERCLAL QPERATION8L69 Sub Exemption for levy of user fee to Dignitaries It has come to notice that some of the dignitaries, especially Honourable Members of Parliament (MPs) and Honourable Members of Legislative Assemblies (MLAs) who are exempted from user fee (toll} under the respective notifications,_ are not being granted exemption at the It is once again directed that exemptions extended to various dignitaries ad other vehicles, a8 provided in the respective  notifications, must be honoured in letter and spirit and with most courteously This issues with the approval of Competent Authority (M M Lohia) General Manager {CO) To: All PIUs/ CMUs: NHAI submitted for favour of informnation: All Members Alt CGMs/ CVO AlI GMs/TAG / Counsel (LA} PS to Chairman Librarian Chief Engineer (PIC} , DoRT&H NHAL plazas.
